trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that compares the value of an activity member to a specified value by using a specified comparison operator.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma condição que compara o valor de um membro de atividade para um valor especificado utilizando um operador de comparação especificada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] You can use an ActivityTrackingCondition to constrain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> or an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Pode utilizar um ActivityTrackingCondition para restringir um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar o construtor predefinido, tem de definir explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must also set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Também tem de definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>é `Equals`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"></xref> class by specifying an activity member and a value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"> </xref> classe, especificando um membro de atividade e um valor de comparação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> is set to `member`, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is set to `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>está definido como `member`, e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>está definido como `value`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>é `Equals`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of an activity member.
trans-unit.target: O ponto delimitados nome de um membro de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The value to be compared
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser comparada

trans-unit.source: member is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: memberé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity member that is to be compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do membro de atividade que está a ser comparada ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value*>

trans-unit.source: You can specify an activity property or field, a member of an activity property or field, or a single element of an activity property or field (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar uma propriedade de atividade ou um campo, membro de campo ou uma propriedade de atividade ou um único elemento de campo ou uma propriedade da atividade (ou um membro do), que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>interface.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a single element of a collection.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode especificar um único elemento de uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set Member.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar o construtor predefinido para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, tem de definir explicitamente membros.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified activity member is compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor do membro especificado de atividade é comparado <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>aplicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the activity member
trans-unit.target: O ponto delimitados nome do membro de atividade

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and Member is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A condição foi avaliada e membro são uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and Member is incorrectly formed.
trans-unit.target: A condição foi avaliada e membro tem um formato incorreto.

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and Member does not refer to a valid activity member.
trans-unit.target: A condição foi avaliada e membro não se refere a um membro de atividade válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the operator that is used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o operador que é utilizado na comparação.

trans-unit.source: Currently only supports `Equals` and `NotEquals`.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, apenas suporta `Equals` e `NotEquals`.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Equals" name="Equals" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Equals" name="Equals" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value that is to be compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor que está a ser comparada ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member*>

trans-unit.source: Value is compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Valor é comparado com o valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>aplicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set Value.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar o construtor predefinido para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, tem de definir explicitamente o valor.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: The value used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: O valor utilizado na comparação.
